seoContent.title: Buy Single AirPods
seoContent.intro: Lost an AirPod or is one of your earbuds broken? No worries – at RePairPods you can easily buy single AirPods. Whether you need a single earbud, a new charging case, or even silicone tips, we offer everything at a competitive price. No unnecessary costs for a complete set, with us you buy exactly what you need.
seoContent.solution: At RePairPods we guarantee exclusively original Apple products. Each product is professionally tested for functionality and battery health before being shipped to you. This way you can be sure you receive a reliable product.

seoContent.quality: Additionally, we are the only webshop offering 5 different conditions: from new to budget. This way you decide how much you want to spend and which quality suits you best. With our fast shipping, you'll have a complete set again tomorrow.

whyBuy.title: Why buy a single AirPod?
whyBuy.savings: Buying a single AirPod saves you up to 70% compared to a complete new set. At Apple you easily pay €200+ for new AirPods Pro, while with us you buy a replacement earbud from €39. Smart, right?
whyBuy.sustainability: Additionally, you're making a sustainable choice. By only replacing what's broken or lost, you reduce electronic waste. We give products a second life and thus contribute to a circular economy. Good for your wallet and the environment.

about.title: About RePairPods
about.description: RePairPods is the specialist in single AirPods and charging cases in the Netherlands. Previously known as Airpods-handel, we help dozens of customers daily to complete their AirPods set again. With over 360 positive reviews on Trustpilot and a 4.9 star rating, you can count on quality and service. Our customer service is ready to help via WhatsApp, email, or phone.
